the conditions that are part of an agreement or arrangement, or the features of an activity or idea: He violated the terms of the agreement. She considers results in purely economic terms. I want to leave this job on my own terms.
If two people are on good/bad/friendly terms, they have a good/bad/friendly relationship with one another: He was on good terms with important people in Brazil.
Idiom
in terms of something
